body: In trackless rain forests and marshes, it can be difficult to find dry ground to build on. Goblin tribes living in such areas have learned to live in the treetops. These goblins gain a +4 racial bonus on Acrobatics and Climb checks. This racial trait replaces skilled.
name: Tree Runner
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Goblins/Alternate Racial Traits/Tree Runner
